title: Holiday Taxis launches new in-destination taxi service
text:
Holiday Taxis launches new in-destination taxi service 17 August 2015 Save 
Holiday Taxis has launched a new service allowing customers to pre-book transfers and organise taxi rides in a number of destinations. 
Customers can book in their native language, agree a price beforehand and pay by credit card through the HolidayTaxis Go app. 
“It’s quite simple - our customers love their phones and tablets. They want to use them more when travelling with us and/or our travel industry business partners”, said Cian Kennedy, chief technology officer at Holiday Taxis. 
“So we spend a lot of time on mobile user experience at Holiday Taxis. We’ve upgraded our white label mobile site options for the benefit of our global trade partners. We’ve launched an App to take paper out of the pre-book journey. Providing the in-destination taxi hailing service via HolidayTaxis Go is a perfect next step for our mobile product.”
